titleInfo.title: A series of six drawings by C. Walker, Lieut. Field Engineers, dated Camp, Kharg, 22nd July 1839

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink with wash on paper

mods.abstract: Inscriptions:On recto of each sheet in the lower left-hand corner an annotation ‘Camp Kharg 22d July 1839’ and at bottom right-hand corner signature ‘C. Walker Lieut. Field Engineer’.On verso of each sheet in the upper left-hand corner inscription which relate to the sheet number and reads ‘Karrack’.
